title: 100 Amis
overview: Yannick is a socially maladaptive young man who discovers he is the heir of his eccentric... and multimillionaire uncleThe deceased, died without friends and without family ties, does not want his nephew to end like him. To receive the inheritance, it is very simple: Yannick must have "100 friends" by the end of the year. Unfortunately, as no one likes, this rule seems impossible to overcome. However, he finds a loophole! Facebook friends count. He currently has 90, so he has only ten left to find.!
